title: Story: CLI Ergonomics & Output Standardization
description:
Improve CLI ergonomics for agents and scripting with standardized JSON output, quiet mode, and bulk operations.

## Goal
Make jit CLI more agent-friendly and scriptable by standardizing output formats and adding bulk operation support.

## Tasks
- Standardize JSON output format across all commands
- Add --quiet flag for scripting workflows
- Support bulk operations for gates, labels, and dependencies

## Success Criteria
- All commands with --json flag use consistent JsonResponse envelope
- --quiet flag suppresses decorative output while preserving essential data
- Broken pipe errors handled gracefully
- Bulk operations work atomically

## Benefits
- Easier to script and automate
- Better MCP integration
- Reduced command count for common workflows
- Improved agent experience
